SENT.plain: A 50-year-old man with BehÃ§et's disease and a history of aortobifemoral (ABF) bypass grafting for an abdominal aortic aneurysm was admitted to our Emergency Room with ileus
Upon exploration we found that the ABF graft was occluding the jejunal passage
To the best of our knowledge this is the first such case ever to be reported
